title: Shh. No Jokes. | Frontline Cover Page, Dec ‘23 Edition
comments: Can you post the article in Today's the Hindu about links between animal cruelty and child cruelty.
Our politicians and their chhapri chamchas are thin-skinned idiots.

When I attended Manthan Samvad 2023 few months back, towards the end (when a congress leader was debunking the viral photos) few people stood up blaming the organizers that they only invited anti BJP speakers!

Also, Saral Sampat's satire was amazing and hilarious!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cIO5jQcrcZQ

Sadly the thin skin idiots are backed by the state machinery where they can lock away people for months on flimsy charges followed by years of harassment. Most comedians are just normal people who take a cue and shut up. And large majority is okay with it because BJP serves their purpose. Sad state of affairs.
